name: docsy-example-site
description: Example site that uses Docsy theme for technical documentation.
author: Docsy Authors
spelling: cSpell:ignore docsy hugo htmltest precheck postbuild rtlcss -

scripts._check:links: echo IMPLEMENTATION PENDING for check-links; echo
scripts._commit:public: HASH=$(git rev-parse --short main); cd public && git add -A && git commit --allow-empty -m "Site at $HASH"
scripts.ci:prepare: npm run _get:docsy && hugo mod graph && hugo mod tidy
scripts.ci:test: npm run ci:prepare && npm run fix:format && npm run test && npm run _diff:check
scripts.seq: bash -c 'for cmd in "$@"; do npm run $cmd || exit 1; done' -
scripts.test-and-fix: npm run fix && npm run test-only
scripts.update:docsy:main: hugo mod get -u github.com/google/docsy@main && hugo mod tidy
scripts.update:docsy:mod: hugo mod get -u github.com/google/docsy && hugo mod tidy
scripts.update:main: npm run update:packages && npm run update:docsy:main
scripts.update: npm run update:packages && npm run update:docsy:mod
